SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Record Class Coordinate

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Coordinate
Record Components:
row - coordinate's row
col - coordinate's column
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public record Coordinate(int row, int col) extends Record implements Serializable
Coordinate class to index locations on the board.
Bottom row is 0 and top is 8.
Leftmost col is 0 and rightmost is 8.
See Also:

    • sumList

      public List<Coordinate> sumList(List<Coordinate> offset)
      Sum the current coordinate to a list of offsets.
      This is used to producee more complex structures represented as lists of coordinates.
      Parameters:
      offset - The list of offset to be summed
      Returns:
      the list of coordinates obtained by applying all the offsets to the current coordinate

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with '=='.
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:
      o - the object with which to compare
      Returns:
